cast.original_title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
cast.overview: After the insane General Jack D. Ripper initiates a nuclear strike on the Soviet Union, a war room full of politicians, generals and a Russian diplomat all frantically try to stop it.
cast.title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb

cast.overview: At the start of the First World War, in the middle of Africa’s nowhere, a gin soaked riverboat captain is persuaded by a strong-willed missionary to go down river and face-off a German warship.
cast.title: The African Queen

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Peter Cecil Bull, DSC (21 March 1912 – 20 May 1984) was a British character actor.
